name: Get Chat App
author: Code Cabin

sections.description:
GetChat.App is a super simple and effective WhatsApp Chat Button for your website.

Add WhatsApp Chat, Facebook Messenger or an email button to your website in seconds

Features

  • Easy to install and use
  • Works on both Mobile and Desktop
  • Users are sent to their WhatsApp app to chat with you (mobile and desktop)
  • Left or right position
  • Enter your own WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business number
  • Enter your Facebook Page ID to enable the Facebook Messenger chat button
  • Enter your email address and email subject to enable the email button
  • World-class support from the developer should you need it!

GetChat.App WordPress plugin makes use of third party code located on https://getchat.app in order to build the chat box on your website. The terms of service can be found here.

External dependencies

Get Chat App relies on an external JS file that is loaded from getchat.app. This file is copyright and allows the user to use the chat service and JS servers.
sections.installation:
Download the Get Chat App plugin ZIP file.

Installing the ZIP File

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Go to WordPress Plugins page and click on Add New button, then Upload the .zip file that you downloaded.
  3. Then click “Install Now” and then “Activate”
  4. From the left panel of Dashboard, click on the link called “Get Chat App”

Installing via WordPress Plugin Search

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Go to WordPress Plugins page and search for “Get Chat App”
  3. Then click “Install Now” and then “Activate”
  4. From the left panel of Dashboard, click on the link called “Get Chat App”

That’s it! WhatsApp Chat will now be enabled on your site!
sections.faq:
How does this work?

Once a user types a message in the WhatsApp chat box on your site, they are instantly taken to their WhatsApp app on their phone with the message and your number pre-loaded for them. The message is sent using their WhatsApp app which is then received on your WhatsApp app.

What about Desktop users?

WhatsApp Web will open instead of the Mobile App. Your mobile number and their message will be pre-loaded and sent to you via their web.whatsapp.com
sections.changelog:
1.2.02 – 2023-12-11

  • Refactored code
  • Updated the admin interface and styling
  • Added X button support
  • Added TikTok button support
  • Added LinkedIn button support
  • Added Phone button support
  • Added Custom Link button support
  • Added multiple contacts support

1.2.01 – 2023-10-16

  • Fixed readme file
  • Change source of SVG image to local

1.2.00 – 2023-10-02

  • Refactored code
  • Added input helpers
  • Updated the plugin logo/icon
  • Updated the mail button icon
  • Removed Facebook iframe
  • Added Messenger chat
  • Added custom message for Messenger
  • Added reply time for Messenger
  • Added Instagram button support
  • Added Telegram button support

1.1.00 – 2020-10-30

  • Added in support for Facebook and Email buttons

1.0.05 – 2020-10-15

  • TrustedOrigin added

1.0.04 – 2020-09-30

  • Added a support link on the main settings page

1.0.03 – 2020-09-23

  • Fixed a bug where the demo wasnt updating properly
  • Fixed a styling bug
  • Added support for the new pro feature – Custom Icon

1.0.02 – 2020-09-14

  • Added UTF8 support for some databases that didnt like storing Emojis

1.0.01 – 2020-08-31

  • Changes to the Pro menu

1.00 – 2020-08-28

  • Launch!

sections.reviews:
All In One Floating Chat

By Anonymous User 21018435 (anonymized_21018435) on January 2, 2024

I recently implemented Get Chat on my website and I must say, I am extremely impressed with its performance. This chat widget is truly light-weight and fast responsive, making it very efficient for both me as the website owner and for my website visitors.

One of the first things that caught my attention about Get Chat was its floating widget. This feature makes the widget easily visible on the page, making it convenient for visitors to seek assistance if needed. This has definitely increased the engagement on my website and has grabbed more attention from my visitors.

In terms of features, Get Chat has it all. I was pleasantly surprised to see the variety of customization options available. I was able to personalize the chat widget to fit the theme and branding of my website perfectly. Additionally, the chat widget has options for agents to handle multiple chats at once, making it a more efficient tool for my customer support team.

What I appreciate the most about Get Chat is its ease of use. Both for me as the website owner and for my visitors. The installation process was simple and I was able to integrate it seamlessly into my website. The chat widget interface is also user-friendly, allowing visitors to quickly start a conversation and get their queries resolved.

Another great feature of Get Chat is its responsiveness. No matter what device my visitors are using, the chat widget adapts beautifully and provides a seamless experience. This has helped in increasing customer satisfaction as they can reach out for help anytime, anywhere.

Overall, I highly recommend Get Chat for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient chat widget. It has definitely improved the communication on my website and has helped in increasing customer engagement. Plus, the customer support team is also very responsive and helpful. Get Chat is definitely a game changer in the online chat widget market. Give it a try and see the difference for yourself!

Awesome app

By smcrmo on September 20, 2020

Perfectly simple to install and set up, a much-needed plugin for a small business.

Game changer

By 2nde on September 3, 2020

This is a great app very minimal cost but can be the difference between getting that extra sale and losing out...The fact that potential customers can easily get a message directly to your phone and you can answer their question right away is the epitome of customer service for the new age. 5 out of 5

Einfach und praktikabel

By modKlaus on September 3, 2020

Sehr gutes PlugIn. Einfach in der Einrichtung und alles funktioniert wie man es erwartet. Funktioniert natürlich nur für WhatsApp-User. Für die Desktop-Nutzung muss man WhatsApp installieren und per QRCode in seinem Account freigeben. Aber das muss man ja eh, wenn man WhatsApp z.B. inter Windows nutzen möchte.

Really Useful and Simple to Manage

By MikeF (TeddyBare) on September 2, 2020

I've tried a few similar plug-in, but the configuration is nice and easy on this one and it does what it says on the tin. Enough configuration options exist to make it look the way I want, and control over the way it appears. Whilst this is an early version, I'm expecting it to continue to improve and is from a trusted developer, so feel confident it having it up and running.

Awesome plugin!

By Nick van de Veerdonk (nmvdvjr) on September 2, 2020

Fast and easy to configure, looks great, allows lightweight chat function on my website! Would love shortcode/hook feature to place button anywhere I like :)

short_description: Add a WhatsApp chat button to your website in seconds. Allow visitors to simply tap to chat through WhatsApp and other different platforms.
